message:
Chittagong er 41no ward dakshin potengai gori gori bristi hocche. Domka haowa boiche. Tobe temon kono koi-kothi hoini. Poristhithi akon o shababik. Ward councilor DR. Nurul Abser er pokkho teke maiking kore nirapod sthane ashroi nithe bola hoyeche.
Abong sobar kache dowa cheyecen.

-ফ্যান পোস্ট
